snippet: The Atlanta BeltLine is an ambitious proposal to transform 22 miles of vine-covered railroad into parks, housing and public transit around the city.
abstract: Atlanta BeltLine is an ambitious proposal to transform 22 miles of vine-covered railroad into parks, housing and public transit around the city; critics, citing suburban traffic gridlock as priority, urge project be scaled back, but supporters point to signs of progress for parks and trails.
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta BeltLine is an ambitious proposal to transform 22 miles of vine-covered railroad into parks, housing and public transit around the city.

headline.seo: BeltLine Provides New Life to Railroad Tracks in Atlanta
headline.main: Now Atlanta Is Turning Old Tracks Green
headline.print_headline: Now Atlanta Is Turning Old Tracks Green
